author: COMSOL
description: This model shows the workflow to compute the satellite temperature on multiple orbit periods. The direct solar, albedo, and Earth radiative thermal loads are precomputed in an Orbit Thermal Loads study and reused on multiple orbit periods in an Orbital Temperature study.
label: spacecraft_thermal_analysis.mph
name: root
